DOC.brief_summary: The goal research study learn breast cancer survivorship possible way improve breast cancer survivorship program use technology . Objectives : Objective 1 : Assess breast cancer survivor acceptability preference integration patient navigation eHealth technology platform improve care Survivorship Clinic Lyndon B. Johnson Hospital . Objective 2 : Assess clinic stakeholder acceptability preference integration patient navigation eHealth technology platform improve care breast cancer patient Survivorship Clinic Lyndon B. Johnson Hospital .
DOC.detailed_description: Breast Cancer Survivors : If patient agrees take part study , visit cancer survivorship clinic follow test procedure perform : - Patient 30-60 minute interview ask cancer-related informational need , feeling survivorship care plan , prefer method communication survivorship clinic staff . - Patient ask whether would use internet technology ( text message appointment reminder ) tool breast cancer survivorship . - Patient use web-based tool call HealthATM . HealthATM website design provide information tool help patient well manage health . After 10-15 minute session website , patient ask easy website use question session . - Patient complete short questionnaire end interview ask personal characteristic , involve health care , attitude towards HealthATM website . It take 5 minute complete questionnaire . All interview audiorecorded . All audio recording keep 5 year destroy . All interview data store password-protected computer and/or lock file cabinet . There personal identifying information connect patient 's interview answer . Length Study : All study procedure take place one visit . The visit last 60 minute . This investigational study . Up 40 participant enrol study . All enrol LBJ General Hospital . Clinic Stakeholders : If clinic staff agree take part study , follow test procedure perform : - Clinic staff take part 60-90 minute focus group session ask feeling survivorship care plan think web-based eHealth program would helpful tool breast cancer survivorship . - Clinic staff ask challenge barrier feel face survivorship program LBJ . - Clinic staff use web-based tool call HealthATM . HealthATM website provide information tool help patient well manage health . After 10-15 minute session website , ask easy website use question session . All focus group session audiorecorded . All audio recording keep 5 year destroy . All focus group data store password-protected computer and/or lock file cabinet . There personal identifying information connect focus group answer . Length Study : All study procedure take place one visit . The visit last 60 minute . This investigational study . Up 40 stakeholder enrol study . All enrol LBJ General Hospital .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18years old ( survivor stakeholder ) 2 . Ability read speak English Spanish ( survivor ) 3 . Ability read speak English ( stakeholder ) 4 . Active patient LBJ General Hospital Survivorship Clinic ( survivor ) 5 . Previous cancer diagnosis evidence recurrence 3 year great follow initial diagnosis ( survivor ) 6 . Harris County Hospital District employee offer clinical administrative support LBJGH Cancer Survivorship Clinic ( stakeholder ) 7 . Cancer survivor least 6 month diagnosis 1 ) None
